1.2.name: wordpress/mail-on-update
1.2.description:
As of WordPress Version 2.5, WordPress automaticly checks if a new update for an installed plugin or theme is available. However, you still have to check your wp-admin to see the notification. This plugin informs you via E-mail when a new update is available. It uses the build-in update function to periodicly check for new versions at the wordpress plugin and theme directory. If a new version is available, the WordPress-Admin will recieve an E-mail every 12 Hours, informing him which plugins needs to be updated.

As of Plugin Version 2.0 you can set multilple Recipients and filter plugins according to your requirements.

Available Languages

  • German
  • English
  • French
